name: Hilary Bills
description:
I consider myself a good-looking, i do believe in soul mates and i know that God has the right woman for me when the time comes, I am a nice person as well. With my friends i communicate and sociable. In the couple partnership i am affectionate and romantic,friend and confident. i’m open-minded and cheerful. i work hard and i wants to grow both in my job both personally. i am romantic, caring, faithful.,I am jealous of what i love.
I enjoy putting on a nice pair of jeans, white tee shirt and sneakers.I love to be Watched building anything, doing home improvement together, a woman’s arms turns me on,I like good perfume, have a nice smile and gentle soft eyes,i enjoy a royally good ,soft and french
kisses.
I want to love a woman for who she is, to spoil her, and love her, and let her know just how much she means to me, by the little things I do or say to make her feel special. while at the same time she treats me in the same way with love and respect. I’m really looking for Someone Honest, Caring, Romantic, Kind, Posses Great Sense of Humor, Loyal, gentle, cheerful, Has the fear of God in her life, LOVES KIDS, responsible,someone that still believes in true love, Affectionate,
Passionate, Understanding, Intelligent,Respectful and Trust Worthy.
